name: Santa's Factory
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 40, by Gonçalo Tavares (sound), Sara Martins and Vasco Rodrigues (everything else).

We all know Santa, right? He spends all year round crafting toys in his Factory on North Pole, away from people, civilization, social life...

Well, this year Santa has become too stressed and slacked off! (Let's face it, you would too :P) This year Santa hasn't even begun separating the toy boxes... Which is why we decided to replace Santa with you! Congratulations on your new job!

Get right at work and separate those stubborn gift boxes, but remember, don't get stressed with the amount of boxes, like your predecessor...

How to Play

  • WASD / Arrows to Move
  • Mouse to Look/Turn around
  • E to pick up boxes
  • Spacebar (LD40 version) / Left mouse click (1.4 version) to Throw boxes

Good luck and... Merry Stressmas!
